videos.description: Jaylin Williams sends the outlet pass to Stanley Umude for the emphatic two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Stanley Umude drops the two-handed hammer for Arkansas) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Stanley Umude drops the two-handed hammer for Arkansas
